name: Cublet
description: A Cublet represents a single piece on the Rubik's Cube. This is the superclass for the three types of pieces/cublets: corners (3 colors), edges (2 colors), and centers (1 color).

constants.name: ORIENTED
constants.description: This integer value represents the oriented state of a Cublet

instanceVariables.name: solvedX
instanceVariables.description: The XCoordinate of this Cublet's solved position

instanceVariables.name: solvedY
instanceVariables.description: The YCoordinate of this Cublet's solved position

instanceVariables.name: solvedZ
instanceVariables.description: The ZCoordinate of this Cublet's solved position

instanceVariables.name: orientation
instanceVariables.description: An integer to represent the orientation of the Cublet. When equal to ORIENTED, the Cublet is considered correctly oriented. If equal to another value, it is considered unoriented.

methods.name: Cublet()
methods.description: Constructs a Cublet given its solved position (x, y, z), and its orientation. Note that a Cublet should always be initialized from one of its subclasses, never directly as a Cublet

methods.name: Cublet()
methods.description: Constructs a copy of the given Cublet

methods.name: isPermuted()
methods.description: Returns whether or not this Cublet is permuted in its solved position, given its current position (x, y, z)

methods.name: isOriented()
methods.description: Returns whether or not this Cublet is correctly oriented

methods.name: equals()
methods.description: Returns whether this Cublet is the same as that Cublet

methods.name: toString()
methods.description: Returns the String representation of this Cublet
